mapper.sql: fid, fmaid, fgoodseatid, fstockid, fqty, fdate, fmdate, fgperiod
mapper.select:
select
distinct
'true' as QUERYID,
from T_VS_Inventory
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert: insert into T_VS_Inventory (fid, fmaid, fgoodseatid, fstockid, fqty, fdate, fmdate, fgperiod) values (#{fid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{fmaid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{fgoodseatid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{fstockid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{fqty,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{fdate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fmdate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fgperiod,jdbcType=DOUBLE})

insert into T_VS_Inventory
fid,
fmaid,
fgoodseatid,
fstockid,
fqty,
fdate,
fmdate,
fgperiod,
#{fid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{fmaid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{fgoodseatid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{fstockid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{fqty,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
#{fdate,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{fmdate,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{fgperiod,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
mapper.select: select count(*) from T_VS_Inventory
mapper.update:
update T_VS_Inventory
fid = #{record.fid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
fmaid = #{record.fmaid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
fgoodseatid = #{record.fgoodseatid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
fstockid = #{record.fstockid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
fqty = #{record.fqty,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
fdate = #{record.fdate,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
fmdate = #{record.fmdate,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
fgperiod = #{record.fgperiod,jdbcType=DOUBLE},

update T_VS_Inventory set fid = #{record.fid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, fmaid = #{record.fmaid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, fgoodseatid = #{record.fgoodseatid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, fstockid = #{record.fstockid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, fqty = #{record.fqty,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, fdate = #{record.fdate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, fmdate = #{record.fmdate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, fgperiod = #{record.fgperiod,jdbcType=DOUBLE}

update T_VS_Inventory
fmaid = #{fmaid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
fgoodseatid = #{fgoodseatid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
fstockid = #{fstockid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
fqty = #{fqty,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
fdate = #{fdate,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
fmdate = #{fmdate,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
fgperiod = #{fgperiod,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
where fid = #{fid,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update T_VS_Inventory set fmaid = #{fmaid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, fgoodseatid = #{fgoodseatid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, fstockid = #{fstockid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, fqty = #{fqty,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, fdate = #{fdate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, fmdate = #{fmdate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, fgperiod = #{fgperiod,jdbcType=DOUBLE} where fid = #{fid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select:
select t0.*,t1.fid fmaid,t1.materialNumber ,t1.materialName ,t1.materialUnit , t2.fid gID,t2.fnumber gNumber,'' gName, t3.fid fstid,t3.stockNumber ,t3.stockName ,t4.fid cID, t4.fnumber cNumber,t4.fname cName,t5.fid scID ,t5.fname scName,t5.fnumber scNumber,t6.fid ferpstid,t6.fnumber erpstnumber,t6.fname erpstname from T_VS_Inventory t0 left join T_VS_Material t1 on t0.fmaid=t1.fid left join T_VS_GoodSeat t2 on t0.FGoodSeatID=t2.fid left join T_VS_Stock t3 on t0.FStockID=t3.fid left join t_vs_scabinet t4 on t2.fscabinetid=t4.fid left join t_vs_cabinet t5 on t4.fcabinetid=t5.fid left join t_vS_erpstock t6 on t0.ferpstockid=t6.fid
where t1.materialnumber=#{materialnumber}
mapper.update: update t_vs_inventory set fqty=#{fqty} where fid=#{fid}
